entity.name: JuliaAstro
entity.description: JuliaAstro and its affiliated organizations are a community for astronomy in Julia. We strive to foster an ecosystem of packages that interoperate well with each other for a wide variety of different domains ranging from solar system science to large-scale cosmology. As part of the larger Julia ecosystem, our mission is to provide code that is fast, dynamic, composable, and reproducible.

projects.name: FITSFiles.jl
projects.description: A Julia implementation of the Flexible Image Transport System (FITS) file format.
